text:
Remember when Lauren Conrad told us what she had just bought at Zara? Well, much like the rest of us, Conrad's obsession with the retailer didn't end there. In a new blog post for LaurenConrad.com, the multi-hyphenate rounded up a handful of her favorite finds right now, which included everything from her favorite beauty DIY to her number one sweet treat. Of course, we zeroed in on one item in particular: a pair of Zara shorts she loves right now.

"These tropical printed Zara shorts have me dying for an island getaway," Conrad said of Zara's Ruffled Floral Print Bermuda Shorts ($30). And we definitely agree: Thanks to the punchy floral pattern, flattering high-waist silhouette, and subtle frill hemline, these shorts just took the top spot on our wish list. Oh, and did we mention they're only $30? There's pretty much no downside to investing in these cute Conrad-approved shorts. Head over to LaurenConrad.com to see what else made her list.
